data.title: Travel Distance between Delhi and Kalka
data.meta_description: Delhi, India to Kalka, India distance • How many miles / kilometer from Kalka to Delhi? Travel direction, route map & air travel distance between Kalka and Delhi.
data.text:
Distance Between Delhi and Kalka

Given below is the distance between Kalka, India and Delhi, India. A map showing location of Kalka and Delhi with air travel direction is also provided. Along with Delhi - Kalka distance, you can also find current time & time difference between Kalka and Delhi, lattitude & longitude of both cities and flight duration.

Kalka and Delhi are in the same timezone Asia/Kolkata.

Kalka to Delhi Distance • Map & Travel Direction

Travel direction from Kalka to Delhi is and direction from Delhi to Kalka is

The map below shows the location of Kalka and Delhi. The blue line represents the straight line joining these two place. The distance shown is the straight line or the air travel distance between Delhi and Kalka.

What is the travel distance between Kalka, India and Delhi, India? How many miles is it from Delhi to Kalka. 151 miles / 243.01 km is the flight distance between these two places.
